name: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard
name_original: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard
description:
A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard and he's in the mood to bless. In a graveyard full of progressively stronger creatures, take the position of the priest, boost his abilities by collecting powerups as you level up and try to survive as long as you can - with many possible builds! A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard is a retro-style action roguelite game with elements of horror that will challenge you to make the best choices in order to bless the creatures and survive.

> Main features:
- Retro/old school graphics;
- Horror/fear atmosphere;
- Automatic shooting;
- 4 different hats with permanent powerups;
- 10+ different creatures;
- 10+ different powerups to boost the abilities of the priest;
- Procedurally generated map (graveyard);
- Built-in timer;
- Time survived leaderboard;
- Kill counter.
